item.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked: Pre-reserve open for Galaxy S25 series in India - Business Standard
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy Unpacked: Pre-reserve open for Galaxy S25 series in India

Publication Date: January 2024 | Source: Samsung News

Samsung has launched a pre-reserve program for its Galaxy S25 series, allowing customers in India to secure early access and get special benefits worth up to Rs 5,000.

  • Customers can pay a token amount of Rs 1,999 to pre-reserve any model of the Galaxy S25 series.
  • The Galaxy S25 series is set to be unveiled at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22.
  • Benefits include an e-voucher worth Rs 5,000 redeemable on Samsung’s platforms.
  • Pre-reserving customers will receive early access to the new devices, including exclusive color options.
  • The token amount will be adjusted against the final purchase price of the device.
“Customers who pre-reserve will be among the first to receive the new devices after launch.”

This initiative is aimed at enhancing customer engagement and ensuring early adopters of the Galaxy S25 series enjoy exclusive benefits and early product access.

item.title: OnePlus 13R launched in India at Rs.42999: Check out specifications and features - Hindustan Times
item.description:
OnePlus 13R Launched in India at Rs. 42999: Specifications and Features

Publication Date: Jan 08, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

The OnePlus 13R has officially launched in India, aimed at the mid-range smartphone market with impressive specifications and features.

  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC
  • Equipped with a 6000mAh battery
  • Features a 50MP telephoto lens and a 6.77-inch ProXDR display
  • Offers up to 16GB RAM and 512GB storage
  • Price starts at Rs. 42999 with sales commencing on January 13, 2025
“The new-gen has a new processor, a telephoto lens instead of a macro lens, a better battery, and a pleasing design.”

The OnePlus 13R is positioned as a strong competitor in the mid-range smartphone segment, providing significant upgrades over its predecessor.

item.title: India’s uber-rich go well beyond the will - Mint
item.description:
India’s uber-rich go well beyond the will

Publication Date: Not specified   |   Source: Mint

Succession planning among India’s wealthy is a subject that extends far beyond simply naming heirs and dividing assets. Recent survey insights reveal a growing appreciation among affluent Indian families for the importance of preserving family wealth and ensuring business continuity across generations.

  • Wealth management involves intricate legal, financial, and strategic considerations.
  • Affluent families are increasingly recognizing the importance of succession planning.
  • Continued family wealth preservation is becoming a priority.
“Preserving family wealth and ensuring business continuity across generations is intricate.”

As wealthy families in India adapt to changing dynamics, the focus on robust succession planning might significantly influence their long-term economic stability.

item.title: Dell unveils Apple-like rebrand in bid to make PCs cool again - ETBrandEquity
item.description:
Dell unveils Apple-like rebrand in bid to make PCs cool again

Publication Date: January 8, 2025   |   Source: Bloomberg

Dell Technologies Inc. is rebranding its PCs to challenge the stagnation in sales and appeal to modern consumers by simplifying product names akin to Apple.

  • Dell is dropping older product names like “XPS” and “Inspiron”.
  • The new naming strategy will include three tiers: Dell, Dell Pro, and Dell Pro Max.
  • Executives acknowledge the similarities to Apple's marketing naming conventions.
  • AI-optimized systems and the end of support for Windows 10 are expected to drive new purchases.
“Customers really prefer names that are easy to remember and easy to pronounce.” - Jeff Clarke, COO of Dell

This strategic shift aims to re-engage consumers and spur PC upgrades amid a decline in sales.

item.title: Samsung’s massive 115-inch mini-LED TV is its largest yet – but there’s an even bigger one at CES 2025 - TechRadar
item.description:
Samsung’s massive 115-inch mini-LED TV is its largest yet – but there’s an even bigger one at CES 2025

Publication Date: N/A Source: TechRadar

The Samsung QN90F mini-LED, showcasing an impressive 115-inch display, is turning heads at CES 2025. However, it is not the largest mini-LED TV at the event, with the Hisense 116-inch model taking that title.

  • The Samsung QN90F is a successor to the highly regarded QN90D model, known for its performance in sports and gaming.
  • The Hisense 116” model features groundbreaking specs including a new RGB mini-LED backlight design and 10,000 nits brightness.
  • Both TVs emphasize superior viewing experiences with advanced technologies for brightness and glare reduction.
  • Pricing could be a significant factor, with Samsung typically positioned at a higher cost than competitors like Hisense.
With the addition of Glare Free tech to the new model, it should be a fantastic choice for viewing sports in bright rooms.

Choosing between these two impressive mini-LED TVs will be challenging, as ultra-big-screen TV buyers seek the best value and performance features.

item.title: Intel expands Core Ultra AI chips amidst market competition - TechTarget
item.description:
Intel Expands Core Ultra AI Chips Amidst Market Competition

Date: January 7, 2025 Source: TechTarget

Intel has expanded its Core Ultra AI chips lineup, targeting gamers and graphic designers as it aims to counter competition from AMD and Qualcomm.

  • Introduction of Core Ultra 200HX and H series chips for mobile PCs.
  • Launch coincided with CES 2025 and follows previous releases for business PCs.
  • Market demand for AI PCs remains subdued; shipment dips reported by IDC.
  • Intel anticipates stronger positioning in the AI market with upcoming product launches.
"Without these new chips, they would have fallen far behind the others in the AI PC category," said Jack Gold, principal analyst at J. Gold Associates.

Intel's new processors are designed to enhance both gaming and enterprise computing capabilities as the company gears up for future competition.

item.title: CES 2025 | AMD's AI PRO chips to power Dell's new commercial laptops - CNBCTV18
item.description:
AMD's AI PRO Chips to Power Dell's New Commercial Laptops at CES 2025

Publication Date: CES 2025
Source: CNBC TV18

At CES 2025, AMD announced that its Ryzen AI PRO processors will power Dell’s new Pro laptops, marking the chips' debut in Dell commercial devices. These AI-powered PCs promise enhanced productivity, efficiency, security, and advanced AI features like Copilot+.

  • AMD Ryzen AI PRO processors announced at CES 2025.
  • The first use of these chips in Dell commercial devices.
  • AI PCs are touted to enhance productivity with features like real-time translation and AI image generation.
  • Dell has streamlined its laptop lineup, eliminating older model names.
“We’re incredibly proud to collaborate with Dell on the next generation of commercial PCs powered by AMD Ryzen AI PRO processors,” said Jack Huynh, Senior Vice President and General Manager of AMD’s Computing and Graphics Group.
“AI PCs represent the next frontier in computing, transforming how we work, create, and connect,” said Sam Burd, President of Dell’s Client Solutions Group.

The collaboration highlights a significant step in integrating AI technology into everyday computing, making the devices suitable for today’s advanced business demands.

item.title: CES 2025: MSI announces laptop series with Nvidia GeForce RTX 50 series GPUs - The Times of India
item.description:
CES 2025: MSI announces laptop series with Nvidia GeForce RTX 50 series GPUs

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Times of India

This article covers MSI's latest announcements at CES 2025, where they unveiled a series of laptops powered by Nvidia's GeForce RTX 50 series GPUs.

  • MSI's new laptops feature improved graphics performance and enhanced cooling systems.
  • The laptops cater to gamers and content creators with high-performance demands.
  • MSI also highlighted potential advancements in AI-driven gaming experiences.
"The integration of the RTX 50 series GPUs will redefine performance standards in gaming laptops." - MSI Representative

This new laptop series positions MSI strongly in the competitive gaming laptop market, leveraging the capabilities of Nvidia's latest technology.

item.title: Bright Star - Panasonic Canada
item.description:
Bright Star: Panasonic Introduces 2025 Flagship Z95B Series OLED TV with Enhanced Brightness, Re-designed Audio, and Fire TV Built In Enhancements

Date: [Publication Date] Source: [Source Name]

The Panasonic Z95B Series OLED TV has been launched, featuring advanced picture quality, built-in Fire TV, and immersive audio improvements aimed at enhancing the home viewing experience.

  • Features a Primary RGB Tandem Panel for increased brightness and color volume.
  • Integration with Fire TV allows for a personalized content discovery experience.
  • Redesigned 360-degree audio system for immersive theater-like sound.
  • New thermal cooling system improves heat dissipation for sustained OLED performance.
  • Enhanced support for gaming with AMD FreeSync™ Premium and NVIDIA® G-SYNC® compatibility.
  • Calman and ISFccc calibration for professional-grade picture quality adjustments.
“The new True Game Mode ensures every game looks its best by bringing the same color accuracy features used for movies into the gaming experience.”

The Z95B series is designed for a seamless integration of technology and aesthetics, providing a premium viewing and audio experience while introducing advanced features for gamers and streaming enthusiasts.

item.title: CES 2025: Samsung introduces ‘AI for All’ campaign for connected homes and more - The Times of India
item.description:
Samsung Launches ‘AI for All’ Campaign at CES 2025

Publication Date: January 2025, Source: Samsung Newsroom

Samsung unveiled its 'AI for All' campaign, aiming to enhance connectivity in homes and promote user-friendly smart technology.

  • Introduction of new smart home devices utilizing AI technology.
  • Focus on user accessibility and seamless integration.
  • Collaboration with various tech companies to enhance AI capabilities.
“Our goal is to make AI an integral part of every household, simplifying lives through technology.” - Samsung Executive

The campaign highlights Samsung’s commitment to innovation and accessibility in technology.

item.title: The Hyve package security box should protect deliveries from dreaded porch pirates - Engadget
item.description:
The Hyve Package Security Box Should Protect Deliveries From Dreaded Porch Pirates

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Engadget

The Hyve is a smart lockbox designed to prevent package theft, aimed at those who frequently receive deliveries in urban areas.

  • The Hyve is touted as the "first branded smart lockbox."
  • It features a carbon fiber tether that is hard to cut, along with an accelerometer and alarm for added security.
  • The accompanying app includes alerts for the owner and their chosen contacts in case of disturbance.
  • The box is weather-proof and includes a photo window for delivery verification.
  • The device can operate for up to 18 months on battery and solar power.
  • Costing $300, it is set to be released for sale in June 2025.
“Hyve Security says that wide adoption of these lockboxes can eventually allow retailers to ship items without so much wasteful packaging.”

The Hyve presents a practical solution to package theft, especially in urban settings, while also aiming to reduce packaging waste in delivery systems.

item.title: Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2025 starts January 13th - FoneArena
item.description:
Amazon Great Republic Day Sale 2025 starts January 13th

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: FoneArena

Amazon India has announced the Great Republic Day Sale 2025, set to begin on January 13th at 12 PM, with early access for Prime members starting at midnight.

  • Up to 80% off on various categories including smartphones, smart TVs, home appliances, and fashion.
  • Featured brands include OnePlus, Xiaomi, and more.
  • Details for specific deals will be announced in the coming days.

Bank Offers: Amazon partners with SBI Card for up to 10% instant discount on SBI Credit Card and EMI transactions during the sale.

item.title: OnePlus 13 and 13R launched with Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, 6000 mAh battery. Check India price, features - The Economic Times
item.description:
OnePlus 13 and 13R Launched with Latest Snapdragon Chips and 6-Year Update Timeline

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

OnePlus has unveiled their latest flagship devices, the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, both featuring cutting-edge specifications and long-term software support.

Key Points:

  • OnePlus 13 starts at Rs 69,999, while OnePlus 13R starts at Rs 42,999.
  • OnePlus 13 features a 6.8-inch Pro XDR Display, Snapdragon 8 Gen Elite SOC, and a 6000 mAh battery.
  • Both models offer 4 years of OS updates and 6 years of security updates.
  • Camera setup includes multiple 50MP sensors on both devices.
“What are your views on the new launch?”

The introduction of the OnePlus 13 and 13R showcases the brand's commitment to quality and longevity in software support while offering premium features at competitive prices.

item.title: OnePlus Buds Pro 3 wireless earbuds launched in a new colour variant in India - The Hindu
item.description:
OnePlus Buds Pro 3 wireless earbuds launched in a new colour variant in India

Date: January 07, 2025 Source: The Hindu

OnePlus has unveiled a new colour variant of its popular OnePlus Buds Pro 3 wireless earbuds, showcasing the Sapphire Blue option, which comes alongside the launch of the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R smartphones in India.

  • The OnePlus Buds Pro 3 were originally launched in August with features like active noise cancellation up to 50dB and spatial audio.
  • A notable addition is the AI Translation feature that works in conjunction with the OnePlus 13 series.
  • The earbuds utilize dual drivers along with DACs, including 11 mm drivers and 6 mm tweeters in each earbud.
  • They offer a total playtime of up to 43 hours with the charging case, and 5 hours of playtime from just a 10-minute charge.
  • Controls include volume adjustment via slide and music control through pinch gestures.
  • The product supports Bluetooth 5.4 and has a range of up to 360 meters, along with Google Fast Pair capability.
  • The new colour variant is priced at ₹11,999 and will be available from January 10 at various retailers including OnePlus and Amazon.
The new OnePlus Buds Pro 3 now also comes in Sapphire Blue colour priced at ₹11,999.

This launch reinforces OnePlus's commitment to enhancing its audio devices while offering stylish options that meet user needs.

item.title: OnePlus Buds Pro 3 gets a new Sapphire Blue colour: Here’s how much it costs - Digit
item.description:
OnePlus Buds Pro 3 gets a new Sapphire Blue colour: Here’s how much it costs

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 Source: Digit

OnePlus has launched a new Sapphire Blue color for its Buds Pro 3 along with the OnePlus 13 series. While no new features have been added, this color complements the existing variants.

  • Features 11mm dynamic drivers and 50dB Adaptive Noise Cancellation.
  • Offers up to 5.5 hours of playback after just a 10-minute charge.
  • Available for Rs 11,999, with discounts available for early purchasers.
"The buds provide 5+ hours of playback after a 10-minute charge, and up to 43 hours with the charging case."

The new Sapphire Blue variant enhances the existing OnePlus Buds Pro 3, further enriching the product lineup with aesthetically appealing options.

item.title: OnePlus 13 With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC Launched in India Alongside OnePlus 13R: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
item.description:
OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R Debut in India With 6,000mAh Batteries

Publication Date: Tuesday

Source: Gadgets 360

OnePlus has launched its latest smartphones, the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, featuring powerful Snapdragon chipsets and 6,000mAh batteries with fast charging capabilities.

  • OnePlus 13 features a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a 6.82-inch Quad-HD+ display.
  • Available in multiple RAM and storage configurations, priced from Rs. 69,999.
  • OnePlus 13R is equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset, starting at Rs. 42,999.
  • Both models support 5G connectivity and house advanced camera systems.
“The OnePlus 13 has a 6,000mAh battery with 100W wired SuperVOOC charging and 50W wireless charging support.”

In conclusion, the OnePlus 13 and 13R offer advanced features that cater to the demands of modern smartphone users, promising exceptional performance and efficiency.

item.title: Lenovo's new 8.8-inch Android tablet packs Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and 12GB RAM, available now for $499 - 9to5Google
item.description:
Lenovo’s new 8.8-inch Android tablet packs Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and 12GB RAM, available now for $499

Publication Date: [Publication Date] Source: 9to5Google

Lenovo is launching a new gaming-focused tablet, the Lenovo Legion Tab, featuring powerful specifications and a competitive price.

  • The Legion Tab features an 8.8-inch display with a 165Hz refresh rate at a resolution of 2560×1600.
  • It is powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 with up to 12GB of RAM and 256GB of storage.
  • The tablet has a 6,550 mAh battery with two USB-C ports and 45W charging capabilities.
  • It runs Android 14 and includes Lenovo’s “Legion Space” gaming software.
  • The price is set at $499, available for purchase now.
“This tablet offers a compact size without compromising on screen quality or performance.”

Overall, the Lenovo Legion Tab aims to fill the gap in the Android tablet market with its powerful features, appealing to both gamers and general users alike.

item.title: Apple says it will update AI feature after inaccurate news alerts - The Guardian
item.description:
Apple says it will update AI feature after inaccurate news alerts

Date & Source: [Publication Date not provided], Source: The Guardian

Apple has announced plans to update an AI feature that has issued misleading news alerts on its iPhones. The tech giant's AI system circulated inaccurate summaries, including false claims about a murder suspect and incorrect news about Rafael Nadal.

  • Apple is working on a software update to clarify when news notifications are generated summaries.
  • A formal complaint was filed by the BBC regarding inaccuracy in the alerts.
  • Recent AI summaries incorrectly announced Nadal's sexual orientation and the results of a darts championship.
  • The BBC emphasized that the AI's summaries contradicted original content, urging Apple to address these issues.
  • ProPublica also highlighted similar inaccuracies involving the New York Times in previous months.
  • The problematic AI feature was released as part of a strategy to compete in the generative AI market.
  • Calls for the removal of the feature have been made by the National Union of Journalists.
“Apple must act swiftly, removing Apple Intelligence to ensure it plays no role in contributing to the misinformation.” - Laura Davison, NUJ General Secretary

The company plans to continue improving the AI feature based on user feedback and insists on the importance of accurate news reporting.

item.title: Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Samsung announces date for Galaxy S25 series, opens pre-reserve - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Samsung announces date for Galaxy S25 series, opens pre-reserve

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: CNBC TV18

Samsung has officially announced that their next Galaxy Unpacked event will take place on January 22 in San Jose, California, focusing on the new Galaxy S25 series.

  • Pre-reservations are now open in India, requiring a token payment of ₹2,000.
  • Early customers can enjoy benefits worth up to ₹5,000.
  • The Galaxy S25 series will include the S25, S25+, S25 Ultra, and a new model, the S25 Slim.
  • The S25 Slim features a thin design, a 6.7-inch QHD+ AMOLED screen, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a 200MP camera.
  • Samsung may unveil an Android XR-based headset at the event.
  • The Galaxy S25 series is expected to hit stores by February 7, 2025.
“Expect Samsung to redefine the smartphone game once again.”

With the impending release and innovative features, Samsung aims to make a significant impact in the smartphone market with the S25 series.
